mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY( PA_NO, PA_NAME, OTT_NO, PA_TITLE, CREW_NUM, OTT_ID, OTT_PWD, END_DATE, DAY_PRICE, ACCOUNT ) VALUES( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{paName}, #{ottNo}, #{paTitle}, #{crewNum}, #{ottId}, #{ottPwd}, #{endDate}, #{dayPrice}, #{account} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.PA_NO, O.OTT_NAME, PA_TITLE, END_DATE, TRUNC(END_DATE-SYSDATE+2,0) AS LEFT_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTY_JOIN WHERE PA_NO = P.PA_NO) AS JOIN_NUM FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT O USING(OTT_NO)

SELECT P.PA_NO, O.OTT_NAME, PA_TITLE, END_DATE, TRUNC(END_DATE-SYSDATE+2,0) AS LEFT_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTY_JOIN WHERE PA_NO = P.PA_NO) AS JOIN_NUM FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT O USING(OTT_NO)
WHERE
OTT_NO IN (${ottList})
AND
1 = 1
PA_NO IN (SELECT PA_NO FROM PARTY WHERE TRUNC(END_DATE-SYSDATE+2,0) < TO_NUMBER(#{month})*30)

SELECT OTT_NAME, PA_TITLE, PA_NAME, MEM_NICKNAME, PA_NO, END_DATE, START_DATE, TRUNC(END_DATE-SYSDATE+2,0) AS LEFT_DATE, TRUNC(END_DATE-SYSDATE+2,0) * DAY_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT O USING(OTT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON P.PA_NAME = M.MEM_NO WHERE PA_NO = #{paNo}
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NICKNAME, JOIN_DATE FROM PARTY_JOIN P JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE PA_NO = #{paNo}

SELECT R.REF_TNO, R.REPLY_NO, R.REPLY_CONTENT, M.MEM_NICKNAME, R.CREATE_DATE, I.CHANGE_NAME AS "CHANGE_NAME", I.FILE_PATH AS "FILE_PATH" FROM REPLY R LEFT JOIN PARTY P ON (P.PA_NO = R.REF_TNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.REPLY_WRITER = M.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN IMAGE I ON(I.REF_TNO = R.REPLY_WRITER) WHERE P.PA_NO = #{paNo} AND R.STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_WRITER, REF_TNO, REPLY_CONTENT , TABLE_CD) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyWriter}, #{refTno}, #{replyContent} , 'P')
